meanings.definition: The state or quality of being rare.
meanings.sent1: The rareness of the diamond made it highly valuable.
meanings.sent2: The rareness of snow in the desert surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The rareness of finding a four-leaf clover brought luck to the young girl.
meanings.sent4: The rareness of her talent shone brightly among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The rareness of the comet's appearance left a lasting impression on the observers.

meanings.definition: The condition of being uncommon or infrequent.
meanings.sent1: The rareness of blue roses fascinated the botanist.
meanings.sent2: The rareness of solar eclipses made this event a must-see.
meanings.sent3: The rareness of a cat walking on two legs amused the family.
meanings.sent4: The rareness of her laughter echoed through the empty hallways.
meanings.sent5: The rareness of shooting stars made each sighting magical.
